titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 30th anniversary of the proposal for the Strategic Defense Initiative.
A resolution commemorating the 30th anniversary of the proposal for the Strategic Defense Initiative.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the vision and efforts of Ronald Reagan to promote peace and security.
Recognizes and expresses support for the refusal of the people of the United States to accept U.S. vulnerability to a ballistic missile attack on the homeland or overseas.
Commemorates the 30th anniversary of the address of President Reagan on national security and the Strategic Defense Initiative.
